state.code:
erDiagram
    USER ||--o{ POST : "creates"
    USER ||--o{ LIKE : "does"
    POST ||--o{ LIKE : "receives"
    USER ||--o{ FOLLOW : "follows"
    USER ||--o{ REPLY : "writes"
    POST ||--o{ REPLY : "receives"
    USER ||--|| RETWEET : "makes"
    POST ||--o{ RETWEET : "includes"
    POST ||--o{ MEDIA : "attaches"
    POST ||--o{ HASHTAG : "uses"
    POST ||--o{ MENTION : "mentions"
    USER ||--o{ USER-SETTINGS : "configures"

    USER {
        string userID PK
        string username
        string email
        string password
        date joinDate
        string bio
        string location
        string website
    }

    POST {
        string postID PK
        string content
        date postDate
        string userID FK
    }

    LIKE {
        string likeID PK
        string userID FK
        string postID FK
    }

 FOLLOW {
        string followID PK
        string followerUserID FK
        string followingUserID FK
        date followDate
        boolean isApproved
    }
    FOLLOW-REQUEST {
        string followRequestID PK
        string fromUserID FK
        string toUserID FK
        date requestDate
        string status
    }
    REPLY {
        string replyID PK
        string content
        date replyDate
        string postID FK
        string userID FK
    }

    RETWEET {
        string retweetID PK
        string userID FK
        string originalPostID FK
    }

    MEDIA {
        string mediaID PK
        string postID FK
        string type
        string URL
    }

    HASHTAG {
        string hashtagID PK
        string text
    }

    POST-HASHTAG {
        string postID FK
        string hashtagID FK
    }

    MENTION {
        string mentionID PK
        string postID FK
        string userID FK
    }

    USER-SETTINGS {
        string userID FK
        boolean privateAccount
        boolean emailNotifications
    }
